data.name: Economist VR
data.description:
Welcome to the Economist VR app, providing access to VR content from the world’s most influential news publication. Featuring:

Passport: Hyderabad
Hyderabad, India's fourth biggest city, is fast becoming one of the most exciting visitor destinations in the country. Its booming tech scene is attracting global attention and transforming this ancient city into a cosmopolitan hotspot.

Passport: Osaka
Bright lights, bath-houses and seafood markets — explore Japan’s second city with a local who knows its best-kept secrets. 

Ocean: The mystery corals
Lukas Isall of the Palau International Research Centre tells the story of some of the world’s most beautiful and mysterious corals. 

Oceans VR: Net positive
Explore the case for limiting fishing on the high seas, from the viewpoint of diner, fish, fisherman and policymaker. 

RecoVR: Mosul, a collective reconstruction
Tour the Mosul Museum in Iraq, destroyed by Islamic State but recreated in VR in conjunction with Rekrei, a heritage project.
